layout.dados: select date_part('hour', hora_abastec) || ':00', count(*) from lancto where operacao='V' and bico!='' and not bico is null and empresa=$empresa and hora_abastec::date between $data_ini and $data_fim group by date_part('hour', hora_abastec) order by date_part('hour', hora_abastec)

select date_part('hour', hora_abastec) || ':00', sum(quantidade) from lancto where operacao='V' and bico!='' and not bico is null and empresa=$empresa and hora_abastec::date between $data_ini and $data_fim group by date_part('hour', hora_abastec) order by date_part('hour', hora_abastec)
